website_summaries.verdict: Very affordable model offers sleek, modern appearance combined with multiple access and security options you would usually expect to pay a lot more for.
pros: Provides Bluetooth or touchpad access, with anti-peep (code hiding) technology
The lack of a physical keyhole protects it from “bump” keys (a 9V battery connector gives secure backup)
Support for full WiFi is possible
cons: If you want WiFi connectivity, it requires an extra unit at an additional cost
Although fitting is straightforward, several owners struggled with the app

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work. Waste of time.
customer_reviews.text: Spent 2 hours installing and trying to troubleshoot. It would not work unless the metal key was left in the lock at all times. We could not even lock it manually. The only access to customer support is an email address. Instructions are not clear and do not have a troubleshooting section. We googled and called Amazon tech support and they couldn’t even find a customer support number. This lock is a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: TMR

customer_reviews.title: Directions are worthless
customer_reviews.text: You will need to be very mechanically inclined to install this. The directions are useless. The only way I was able to install this lock is that I am very handy with these kind of things and it was a hellava challenge for me. It looks good on my door. So far the functionality works good. Only thing is that there are no sensors or anything, so if you are like me and have your door open on nice days, the lock will not sense that the door is open and will auto lock if you have that feature enabled. So you door is sitting there open with the deadbolt lock in the lock position.
customer_reviews.author: cmayfld89Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall like the unit - but the LONGGGG passcodes- What gives?
customer_reviews.text: Have had these installed for a few months. Overall very happy with results. Setup could be easier but not to bad . . the only think I HATE about this unit is the crazy long pass codes. I wish they would offer a firmware upgrade and allow users to choose the length of the passcodes. Why in the HELL does my passcode need to be 8 characters????????? I would rate this 5 stars, but took one star away for the frustrating pass codes.
customer_reviews.author: Robertoe

customer_reviews.title: Stop!! No good instructions about set up
customer_reviews.text: This product was not only difficult to install technically, app users etc. impossible to set up. Every time I touch the lock an alarm goes off. No instructions have been clear. Amazon says call us. We will help. They were not helpful. Overseas company has not relied. I have spent hours trying to get this thing to work. They have a great video about installing, made that part easy, but it’s no good if you can’t work the thing once it is installed. One of my more Arduous of Amazon purchases. It seems like everything good gets too big for good business.
customer_reviews.author: cclentine

customer_reviews.title: I am a Believer
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried that this lock might not live up to my expectations. I was surprised. it works great. Feels sturdy and the app works well enough. I don't bring my house keys when I leave the house. Great product. Install was not bad. You need to drill an extra hole. Also, make sure to put the L or R switch in the right position. I didn't do that right at first and on the app it says press to lock but it actually unlocked it. Now it works perfectly. i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Kang

customer_reviews.title: Great lock!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and convenient lock! set up is extremely easy, with minimal tools, style is a solid 10. I did a lot of research before I decided to make this purchase and this one fit all my needs. I've recently had to contact customer service and they were very helpful and quick to respond. I would highly recommend this lock!!!
customer_reviews.author: DHO

customer_reviews.title: Not Reliable
customer_reviews.text: First of all I would like to watch the installation that some say only take 10 mins. Seeing is believing and right no I don't believe it. Secondly, their app is totality unreliable. I just rechecked door status. The door is open, the app says it is locked. I don't think so. I have checked status many times over with same results so this is ongoing. Also, it is not near real time. Mine is still showing results from 22:14 yesterday. This ongoing as well. The good news is that it does lock and unlock when you tell it too even though it is very slow.,
customer_reviews.author: John Heyer

customer_reviews.title: Belongs in the trash.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. The lock had made my home more vulnerable because the mechanism or something inside is reversed. The functions to unlock actually lock it and vice versa. I have written the company numerous times with no response. Yet they known releasing app updates. So, basically, they don’t care. Don’t waste your time or money. I have since removed the lock and thrown it away, because it’s total trash
customer_reviews.author: SBL

customer_reviews.title: works terrific once you get the left and right terminology in the instructions right
customer_reviews.text: this works great, relatively easy to install, just take care getting the left or right door orientation switch correct, super easy to use and a great addition to my back door ( i have kids that cant be trusted not t lose their keys, lol) - but all in all a great product and i recommend you get it if thats what youre looking for
customer_reviews.author: Anric

customer_reviews.title: Works but makes you work
customer_reviews.text: The design is phenomenal and I appreciate the no branding which is always added security fyi. However they sent me a used product to start the link for installation video they sent doesn’t work says account disabled on YouTube lol. The picture with installation instructions and dimensions of what to drill was too small and illegible. Took far longer than needed and the range says 6 meters but it barely reaches 2.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Love the auto lock feature
customer_reviews.text: Great lock even though the termite locking and unlocking only works through bluetooth in close proximity, at least you can still set access codes and auto locking. For remote access I had to buy a separate hub. Was easy to install and love the auto lock feature.
customer_reviews.author: MyCorner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lock and customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and setup. Everything worked as expected. Used gateway for remote management. For the price, this gives you a lot of features. Definitely will buy again. Great support as well when i had trouble clearing up a remote code.
customer_reviews.author: I. Khan

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job and app is relatively easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The main entry door, gets used several times a day. Gives the ability to generate a random code or a remote unlock, assign name, hours etc. The settings here would recommend making more customizable ie editing scheduled codes for contractor use such as maid service where schedules may change.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: So I’m constantly locking myself out of my house so this purchase was a no brainer. I was able to install the lock myself (who needs a man anyways) and it works like a charm. I would love if they came out with a deadbolt combo like this!!! I would definitely be a repeat customer if so. I feel so techy!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Scribner

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 4 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 4 weeks; this item Was working great but stopped working; changes batteries etc. It started off with a few lighting glitches, then all power to lights and locking mechanisms stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Logos

customer_reviews.title: Poor product and even worse customer service
customer_reviews.text: This product came defective. I had to google to get customer service information but they were not working on weekends. One hinge broke off and locked us out. This is the worst product that I have ever purchased in Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Had one for a few months and it quit working, bad version, but their great customer service department hooked me up with a better, more reliable one and we haven't had any more problems since. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Scott McClanahan

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! Instructions is horrible. The product itself have so many issue when link with the apps on your phone. It never work properly since we first got the keypad but it’s too complicated to take the lock apart. Less than 30days and it’s completely waste of money. Don’t not buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Thang l.

customer_reviews.title: Won’t work
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this lock in December and just installed it a few days ago. It does not unlock!!! When we put the code in it will lock but when we put it in again the thing won’t turn to unlock. So now we have to unlock with the key... not the idea.
customer_reviews.author: Katya M

customer_reviews.title: Nice lock
customer_reviews.text: The reason I gave installation only three stars is that the instructions were horrible and there‘s very little online for help. Having since installed three I now think it’s easy to install but the instructions - if you’re a first timer - aren’t good. Once installed, it’s a great piece of hardware, functions beautifully, and the app is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install & use!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our garage door since that's the one we use most often. It is fairly easy to install, however I would suggest that the pictured directions are a little bigger since I wasn't able to see them very clearly. Other than that, installation was easy & the app is simple to use. It has already been such a great help when I literally locked the door & left my car keys inside with my previous deadbolt key. Had I not installed this, I would have been locked out of my house!
customer_reviews.author: Loni Kost

customer_reviews.title: Almost.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lock and all the available options. How ever the app seems to always run. My phone asks me to shut it down. The down side, it isn't clear in the description that you need a additional device to make it wifi costing another 40 dollers not even a link to the product
customer_reviews.author: S. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Def a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love the ability to create temporary or permanent or one time passwords. One drawback is that when it is set on auto lock.....it does lock, the bolt comes out but the door doesnt have to be closed and it still "locks".
customer_reviews.author: Chery D

customer_reviews.title: Works reasonably well
customer_reviews.text: Needed this to manage airbnb rental and it works well for that. Sometimes, it can be glitchy, but it otherwise works. Very easy to install and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 48443

customer_reviews.title: It started melting a couple of days after we installed it..
customer_reviews.text: It also didn’t come with any instructions whatsoever. Don’t buy this lock.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great looks good, installation directions could be a bit better
customer_reviews.author: five star

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It works fine and I am satisfied. I didn’t give it a 5 stars because it doesn’t work 100% with my Apple Watch. I can open the door with it but I can’t close it back with the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Returned lock , due to complicated instructions
customer_reviews.text: Had to return, due to complicated installation instructions! Ended up getting Schlage Encode lock, similar features as described for this lock and super easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: Naeberry

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. East install, easy app, easy setup. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Phillips Verken

customer_reviews.title: Nice lock, works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, installs easy, interface worked great, nice to be able to use your smartphone to lock & unlock
customer_reviews.author: Francois Billard

customer_reviews.title: No issues
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for a week with no issues! It was simple to install. The instructions are vague, but if you have installed a deadbolt before it is easy to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice overall. Wish it had approximation/motion sensor so it can unlock automatically. Apple Watch app works well as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Junk don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get the lock to work beyond a constant alarm Poor design, must totally remove lock to change batteries Wouldn't recommend anyone buying this lock, JUNK!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lock
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t figured out how individual codes can lock the door. They can open but not lock on way out Unexpected purchase needed. Needed to purchase a Gateway device to be able to use away from installed lock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer**

customer_reviews.title: You must drill a small hole in your door above the deadbolt to properly install.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter always forgets her key. This allows us to have the keys but also allows us to give others access to our door, with our phones. My daughter chose a numeric code and has the app, so she'll never be locked out. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Hessmann

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Bought this brand and a Schlage. I also had to buy the hub to make this a remote operated system. The Schlage sells one with hub included for about the same price. The Schlage is better constructed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jarman

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: Defective product. Hopefully someone responds to my email so I can get it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Maleno

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible- installation was a mess, could not get the lock to work. returned for another lock which I’m super happy with.
customer_reviews.author: Marine1936

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the look and functionality of it. It too hard to install and operate. It was a little hard to find the online tutorial, the video was not professional
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: didn't last
customer_reviews.text: worked great for almost a full year. Now it just beeps, not sure and can't figure out whats wrong. Couldn't find any troubleshooting help.
customer_reviews.author: dave holub

customer_reviews.title: It works good
customer_reviews.text: It works good as well as app! But the instruction pics are wayyyy too small so I can’t read and if it was bigger it could save a lot of time lol
customer_reviews.author: IRIS CHOW

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I love not having to use a key. I hope it lasts so far very good!
customer_reviews.author: Lonnee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent door lock, has great options in the app and love it !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: The deadbolt broke and would not even turn not even a month after it was installed. This product is junk!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I've installed other keypad locks before and I could not figure this one out. I need to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Gangemi

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were clear, app feels like an office app lol. Great Lock and App though
customer_reviews.author: Joshten Delacruz

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS. POS that will stop working 6 months later with no support.
customer_reviews.text: I repeat: DO NOT BUY THIS. POS that will stop working 6 months later with no support.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Thoming

customer_reviews.title: Horrible instructions
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are horrible, there is no instructions on this gateway thing! Just dumb!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Don’t go cheap thinking it’s going to be better
customer_reviews.text: No support when it malfunctioned two weeks after having it.
customer_reviews.author: RandiLynn

customer_reviews.title: Ultra Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting keyless entry on my home for quite some time and decided finally to just make the jump. I love how classy this unit looks, no rubber buttons that will yellow or flimsy flip-pads. The set-up didn't seem too difficult (my husband did it) and the included physical keys were a definite bonus (easing my worries about what happens if the electric goes out.) We set the code as something out son can remember so I can have him open the door for me when my hands are full, which is a huge help. This also lets me go on walks around the neighborhood without needing to carry my keys, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Provides added security to your home
customer_reviews.text: We have been wanting to get a keyless entry door lock for our front door for a while now. We have several friends that have them and the ease of leaving the house without your house key is so appealing. We installed the lock and we’re very happy with how we can be free of the house key. This set does come with keys, but instead of them being on our key ring, it’s hidden on our porch as a back-up for just in case. The keyless door lock works perfectly and with the app on our phone we can lock/unlock our door remotely for added security.
customer_reviews.author: Mack

product_meta.title: Smart Lock Front Door, Keyless Entry Door Lock Deadbolt, Digital Electronic Bluetooth Door Lock with Keypad Auto Lock for Home Hotel Apartment Office
feature_bullets: Smarter and Safer - Smart Lock Front Door set out to provide extra home security with keyless codes, Bluetooth unlock, anti-peep password and auto lock (5-120s) to keep your house safe and sound.

Real Time Record - Through Keyless Door Locks for Homes APP, you could check the unlocking records and wrong password records from the Admin account in real time. And you’ll have comfort in knowing your door’s status.

Fast Sharing and Convenient - With Smart Digital Door Locks for Homes, You can share code with friends and guests valid for a few weeks,hours, or minutes, and revoke them again whenever you need to. Never worry about lost, stolen or copied keys again.

Easily Install and Smart Reminder - Just a screwdriver and A easy-to-follow instruction to easily install Door Locks with Keypads. And when in low battery, Keypad Door Lock Deadbolt Set will alarm and could be temporary charged by a 9V battery.
12-Month - Homaide offers 30 days money back and 12-Month free replacement. Any Questions for Electric Door Locks. Do Feel Free to Contact US homide@milinaa.com.
